original_text: Put two wicked men in seats near him. Tell them to accuse Naboth that he has insulted God and the king. Then take him out. Throw stones at him until he is dead.’
korean_text: 불량자 두 사람을 그의 앞에 마주 앉히고 그에게 대하여 증거하기를 네가 하나님과 왕을 저주하였다 하게 하고 곧 그를 끌고 나가서 돌로 쳐죽이라 하였더라

sentences.original_text: Put two wicked men in seats near him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 근처 좌석에 두 명의 악한 자들을 앉히시오.

sentences.original_text: that he has insulted God and the king.
Throw stones at him until he is dead.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 죽을 때까지 그에게 돌을 던지시오.
